Sentencas: This paper presents a conceptualized combined heat and power (CHP) scheme based on coal gasification and with a high temperature, pressurized solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in the topping cycle and a bottoming steam cogeneration cycle.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An energy analysis is done for this CHP plant.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The study reveals that such a plant offers a substantial saving in fuel with respect to separate plants for the same power and utility heat.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The total power of the plant optimizes at a pressure ratio for a given cell operating temperature.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, this optimum pressure ratio increases with higher cell operating temperatures.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: On the other hand, the utility heat rate decreases with the increasing pressure ratio for any cell operating temperature.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In a combined effect of these utility outputs (i.e. power and utility heat), the overall performance of the plant, expressed by fuel energy savings ratio (FESR), is found to optimize at a particular pressure ratio for a given cell operating temperature.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For example, the maximum FESR is found to be 30% for an optimum pressure ratio of about 18 for a cell operating temperature of 1273 K. (c) 2005
Titulo: Energy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell
